jobTitle: Skilled and experienced Office and HR Manager
jobDescription: Jobox is a stealth-mode ai startup disrupting the on-demand economy. Backed up by highly acclaimed Silicon Valley VCs and angels, we’re off on a mission to change a full range of industries. This is a great opportunity to gain experience with a sharp & experienced team having successful exits in their past.Your role will be comprehensive and exciting from pioneering, facilitate our daily office activities and do everything that can help us achieve our goals and continue skyrocketing!Responsibilities Deliver high-quality work in a fast-paced, dynamic work environment through effective priority management, executing processes that may not have defined procedures, taking initiative to complete unanticipated or ad hoc tasks and delivering work within deadline.Oversee and working with the management team to develop new procedures to support our growth.Manage and maintain the general office supplies & needs. Working on special projects. Maintain the company’s social media present.Research and track down potential candidates online, screen incoming resumes and CV's. Oversee interviewing process. Interview candidate, check references.Maintains the work structure by updating job requirements and job descriptions for all positions.Help to create and maintain the company culture.QualificationsBachelor's degree required (HR or relevant field)Prior HR experience. Detail-oriented, analytical, and an effective problem solver.Excellent written and verbal communication skillsDemonstrated ability to follow through on tasks/projects assigned Ability to multitask and prioritize projects and work in a time sensitive environment Additional language skills a plus
